title: Microsoft Teams Onboarding for Remote Tech Employees
description: A practical, easy-to-follow course designed to help remote tech employees feel comfortable and confident using Microsoft Teams for daily communication, collaboration, and productivity.
goal: Enable remote tech employees to effectively use Microsoft Teams for daily tasks by providing a practical, easy-to-follow onboarding course that focuses on essential features without overloading them with unnecessary details.
audience: Tech professionals working remotely who need to use Microsoft Teams for their daily tasks.

chapters.title: Introduction to Microsoft Teams

sections.title: Overview of Microsoft Teams
sections.description: An introduction to the key features and benefits of Microsoft Teams.

sections.title: Setting Up Your Profile
sections.description: Guidance on creating and customizing your personal profile within Microsoft Teams.

chapters.description: This chapter provides an overview of Microsoft Teams and how to set up a personalized workspace.

chapters.title: Communication Basics: Chat

sections.title: Navigating the Chat Interface
sections.description: Instructions on using the chat interface for one-on-one and group conversations.

sections.title: Sending Messages and Files
sections.description: How to send text messages, images, files, and links within chats.

chapters.description: This chapter covers essential communication skills using Microsoft Teams' chat feature.

chapters.title: Collaboration Tools: Meetings

sections.title: Scheduling a Meeting
sections.description: Steps to schedule and manage meetings in Microsoft Teams.

sections.title: Joining and Participating in Meetings
sections.description: How to join, participate, and collaborate during virtual meetings.

chapters.description: This chapter focuses on using the meeting feature for effective collaboration.

chapters.title: Document Management: Files

sections.title: Uploading and Sharing Documents
sections.description: Guidance on uploading, sharing, and managing documents in Microsoft Teams.

sections.title: Working with Shared Folders
sections.description: How to organize and collaborate on shared folders within the platform.

chapters.description: This chapter explains how to manage files and documents using Microsoft Teams' file management tools.

chapters.title: Voice and Video: Calls

sections.title: Making Voice and Video Calls
sections.description: Instructions on initiating and participating in voice and video calls within Microsoft Teams.

sections.title: Advanced Call Features
sections.description: Exploration of advanced call features such as screen sharing, recording, and muting.

chapters.description: This chapter covers the use of voice and video calls for communication and collaboration.

chapters.title: Enhancing Productivity: Apps

sections.title: Integrating with Other Tools
sections.description: How to integrate Microsoft Teams with other productivity tools and applications.

sections.title: Using Pre-built and Customized Apps
sections.description: Guidance on using pre-built and customized apps within the platform.

chapters.description: This chapter explores how to enhance productivity through app integrations in Microsoft Teams.
